name: Rifle DUDE Project
description:
Meet The Gang The Bounty Hunter
This is and you Move Up or Down, with the Vertical Arrows, and Shoot with Z.
If you Shoot ANY Grunt, you Increase your Range.
If you Shoot an RANDOM Riff, you Decrease your range.
And if you Shoot a Red Barrel, It Explodes.

The Cat
Is your cat, RESCUE IT.The Grunt
He just Dies.The Big Grunt
He Moves thowards the direction of the arrow .The Shielded Grunt
He Reflects your shots.The Red Barrel

Is a RED BARREL it EXPLODES. And that's a LAW. But this is not a character.The RANDOM Riff
I am as confused as you are.
